code: export var SignIn=function SignIn(User){return fetch("http://localhost:4000/signin",{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(User)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var authenciate=function authenciate(jwt,next){if(typeof window!=="undefined"){localStorage.setItem("jwt",JSON.stringify(jwt));next();}};
